_description: Verses in the Latin sermon ‘Quare rubrum est iudumentum tuum’ — six lines

CULIi38.Transcription:
a body tendur of complexion& nobelyst in kyndea pepulle
                    wyckyd of condicioun& of alle men most vnkyndeScharpe &
                    schamefullbest and blisfull
CULIi38.Note: Latin phrases between the lines; written as prose.
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 11.
